cont.entity_b: Very heavy, making it impractical for frequent movement.

cont.entity_a: Ergonomically designed to alleviate strain, especially for people with back problems. Sturdy, and remains in good condition after a year of daily use. Aesthetically pleasing and functional.
cont.entity_b: Good quality and visually appealing. Well-crafted.
High quality and worth the price.

cont.entity_a: Requires a lot of oil to prevent wobbling. Easy to clean with non-skid pads to prevent slipping. Easy to maintain and clean. Bamboo construction requires regular oiling.
cont.entity_b: Requires frequent oiling to maintain condition. Difficult to clean due to weight. Prone to cracking if not properly maintained.
Cracks appeared despite meticulous care. Durable and expected to last a lifetime with proper care.
May not be suitable for all users.

cont.entity_a: Very stable due to its weight and skid-proof feet.
cont.entity_b: Solid and does not move during use.

cont.entity_a: Raises the chopping surface for a comfortable prep area. Includes three bowls for added convenience.
cont.entity_b: Provides a solid, flat cutting surface. End grain construction is beneficial for cutting.
Packaging may not protect the product adequately during shipping.
